TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but his not mentioning it has no impact on your actual battery!

I wish I could consistently think up wishes to put here.

Granted, but they all get terribly corrupted.

I wish that the Minotaur won't steal my config files.

Granted, it crushes them into bits instead.

I wish computers used balanced ternary.

Granted, but you now speak in Igpay Atinlay oreverfay.

 

I wish for I wish for I wish for I wish for I wish for I wish for I wish for I wish for I wish for I wish for I wish for I wish for I wish for I wish for I wish for I wish for I wish for I wish for I wish for I wish for I wish for I wish for I wish for I wish for I wish for I wish for I wish for I wish that I didn't encounter lag right then.

Edited July 21, 2016 by TopHeavy11

Granted. Your lag occurs when you type "encounter lag" instead.

I wish that Dres had an ice and dust dwarf-planet buddy.

Granted. It's you.

 

I wish for __________.

Granted, it stabs you right through the chest and is made of sodium.

I wish for a computer that always does exactly what I want it to, when I want it to.

Granted, but then it breaks and you can't do anything yourself anymore.

I wish for a Minecraft movie.

Granted, it's the worst movie ever.

I wish to get past the third mothership this time.

Granted. You get past it but you're dead

 

I wish for wheels to work well

Granted, they work so well they accelerate vehicles to 0.9999999999999999999999951 c, causing big problems for any nearby planet.

I wish I was tetrachromatic.

Granted! But you are now a reindeer, and power lines scare the crap out of you!

I wish the media would stop giving free-advertising to nut jobs who go on killing sprees

Granted, but they will focus on what celebrites do in their personal life... Oh wait.

I wish Turkey wouldn't block imgur.

Granted, but then everywhere else blocks imgur

I wish that we would just go to Mars already!

Granted. You teleport there immediately, but find out you havs no equipment with you.

I wish I would stop getting hit by severe storms every week.

Granted, instead you are hit by severe asteroid impacts every week.

 

I wish I lived on Phobos.

Granted, your lungs burst from the vacuum and you die fifty seconds later.

I wish to see a big meteor in my lifetime.

Edited July 25, 2016 by cubinator

Granted, it survives re-entry and is aimed at your face.

I wish I didn't have to wait one Kerbin year until the next Duna transfer window.

You get it but the human population is moved to Laythe like that.

I wish it was high noon.

Granted, McCree shoots you from behind.

I wish for McCree to get a watch so he'll stop saying that its high noon when its not high noon.

Edited July 26, 2016 by ZentroCatson

Granted, this is now his watch

 

I wish for the Overwatch memes to stop.

Overwatch? Wish granted, but they begin popping into your mind as you try to sleep.

I wish it (Overwatch) would go away and take My Little Pony television show with it... (my daughter's new favorite show )

 

Edited July 26, 2016 by adsii1970

Granted, it also takes Kerbal Space Program away.

I wish for something.

Granted. Your computer begins an automatic update to Window's latest operating system, "Broken"

I wish I felt like grading the last twenty papers today...

You do! But they are sqaured, so you now need to grade 400 papers.

I wish for the next poster to horribly corrupt my wish.
